Introduction: Hello @! I am the Wizard's twin brother, Twizard!$1#I have been trying to get back to my home in the Rejuvenating Forest. Maybe you can help me?$0#
winter_17: $y 'Did you know today was my birthday?_Yes_Thank you for coming to see me on this magical day!_No_No matter, thank you for visiting anyway!'$1#

Woods: I enjoy living in the woods. It's a much quieter and simpler life.$0#
